name: MEC Cloudburst Shoe Covers - Unisex
description:
A boon for cycle commuters, these budget-approved shoe covers are still nice and streamlined, and will keep your feet dry for the ride to work. Totally waterproof, they can handle west-coast deluges and east-coast squalls.Made of ripstop nylon 66 with a waterproof PU coating and DWR finish.TPU underfoot panel has a large cut-out to accommodate cleats.Elasticized top with hook and loop-adjustable rear entry.Hook and loop adjustable straps across the forefoot create a snug and streamlined fit.Elastic strap keepers prevent straps from flapping or snagging as you ride.Includes a storage stuff sack.Don't use with toe clips. Check the fit carefully before use.

        Sustainability
